Emacs on your Pebble! 

This is a simple scratch buffer, complete with mode line and menu bar. The time piece is based off of (display-time-mode 1) elisp.

Currently only compiled for Basalt (Pebble Time), but if there's a demand for a port I'll be happy to make one, just email me at Corrivatus@gmail.com and let me know.

data.author: mincoshi
data.description:
NEMのハーベスティングの状態を監視できる簡単なWatchFaceです。スマホの設定画面でセットしたNEMアドレスの委任ハーベストの状態(active,inactive)を監視できます。このアプリが正常に動作するためにはbluetoothによりpebbleとスマホを接続し、スマホはインターネットに接続されている必要があります。表示が "?" になっているときはbluetooth接続、スマホのインターネット接続を確認してください。


You can watch the state of NEM harvesting. Pebble need to be connected smartphone by bluetooth, and smartphone need to be connected to the Internet. If the display shows "?", Please check bluetooth connection and internet connection of smartphone.
data.title: NEM_HARVESTING_WATCHER

data.author: plarus

changelog.release_notes:
Enhancement
 * #4 Languages memory management optimisation
 * #5 Time display not colon centered
 * #8 Add Bulgarian language
 * Switch to pebble-fctx-lite
 * Various minor optimisations

Bug correction
 * #10 Bluetooth disconnection icon does not show on bottom sidebar
 * #11 Timeline "Quick View" oddity with Top Bar Position set
 * #12 Gray text display problem with Aplite/Diorite

More informations are available here: https://github.com/plarus/TimeStyleBBPebble

* Aplite get same widget management than other Pebble
* Code cleaning and optimization
* GFont and FFont are loaded only when needed
* Switch to pebble-fctx version 1.6.2

data.description:
Inspired by the visual language of the Timeline found on the Pebble Time, TimeStyle BB is designed as the “present” to complement the Timeline’s “past” and “future”.

Various display options: Up to 3 widgets with left/right bar, up to 4 widgets on top/bottom bar, hour and date dislayed with top/bottom bar.

Readable: With more than 80% of the display area devoted to the time and 6 font options, TimeStyle is designed for readability in all conditions. Unlike most other Pebble faces, time text is displayed using antialiasing, achieved using palette swapping.

Colorful: includes over 20 preset color schemes, and also supports custom colors using any color the Pebble Time can display—also supports saving, loading, and sharing custom presets!

Configurable: TimeStyle features a wide variety of different complications, including step counts, sleep times, weather forecasts, the week number, seconds, the time in another time zone, the battery level, and more.

Keeps you informed: TimeStyle automatically displays notifications when the battery is low or when your phone disconnects.

Works in 30 different languages, more than any other Pebble face: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Turkish, Czech, Slovak, Portuguese, Greek, Swedish, Polish, Romanian, Vietnamese, Catalan, Norwegian, Russian, Estonian, Basque, Finnish, Danish, Lithuanian, Slovenian, Hungarian, Croatian, Serbian, Irish, Latviann, and Ukrainian.

latest_release.release_notes:
Enhancement
 * #4 Languages memory management optimisation
 * #5 Time display not colon centered
 * #8 Add Bulgarian language
 * Switch to pebble-fctx-lite
 * Various minor optimisations

Bug correction
 * #10 Bluetooth disconnection icon does not show on bottom sidebar
 * #11 Timeline "Quick View" oddity with Top Bar Position set
 * #12 Gray text display problem with Aplite/Diorite

More informations are available here: https://github.com/plarus/TimeStyleBBPebble

data.title: TimeStyle BB

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
This is called “Scigns” due to the strange, alien-like hieroglyphs used in the display (sci-fi signs). 

Each sign has 1 or no spots showing. Each spot represents a digit between 1 and 9 - top row shows 1, 2 or 3, middle row 4, 5 or 6 and bottom row 7, 8 or 9. The sign without a spot represents 0. The signs themselves don’t actually represent anything, but simply provide a framework enabling you to see the position of the spots and so determine their values.  The top two signs are the hours and the bottom two the minutes.

The colors are configurable.


Screenshots:
1) Animation running from 6:51 to 7:01
2) 12:48
3) 10:35
4) 23:59 (24-hour mode)


This design was created by Lloyd King, from UK, and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with his permission. 

The original design can be found here: 
https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/05/21/scigns-lcd-watch-with-alien-symbols/
data.title: Scigns

data.description:
Fingers Of Time visualizes time by breaking the hands of a traditional clock into fingers. Each hour has a finger. The tips of the fingers rotates to point to the minute. The fingers are grouped, so you’ll never have to count higher than 4.

This is a preview of the basic design. More options and complications to come.

latest_release.release_notes: Improve minute markers, month, day and battery indicators.

data.description: Sixth Sense is a haptic augmented reality application that translates Bluetooth 4.0 beacons (iBeacons, etc) into haptic signals you can feel using your Pebble smartwatch. Find people, places, and things using their radio beacons! This application is designed as a watch face with a basic time display so the haptic function can run continuously. data.author: mythriz
data.description:
A watchface based on the menu screen in The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening.

Shows time, date, remaining battery as hearts and the number of steps as rupees.

The heart pieces are full when you have reached your configured number of steps.

You can also configure whether month or date is shown first. (24h time is not configurable yet though, unfortunately.)

data.description:
LCD_DOT is a watchface based on the LCD DOT Matrix displays. Currently the watchface contains the following functionality:

- Time
- Date
- Stepcount (foot icon gets replaced with the fifth digit if needed)
- AM/PM or 24H indicator
- Week number
- Battery meter
- Bluetooth indicator
- Temperature
- Weather condition

Through the configuration the following options are available:

- Blink on/off for the separation mark
- Vibrate hourly
- Vibrate on bluetooth disconnect

LCDeck is a clear and simple digital watchface. Design was inspired by the look of the early LCDs.

Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather and has options: color customization, hourly vibration, BT alert, languages for week day.

data.description:
They say imitation is the sincerest form of flattery. I hope that's true because this is an imitation of the amazing watchface TimeStyle by Freakified. There are some differences so if you're looking for a slightly different look, take a chance on Sidebar.

The time is shown large and widgets are down the side (left or right, your choice).

Widgets
=====
- Active time
- Alternate time
- Battery
- Connection / Quiet time status
- Date
- Distance walked
- Seconds
- Steps
- Weather (temperature and conditions)

data.author: clach04

changelog.release_notes: Added support for five timezones, improved Chalk support

data.description:
Pebble Watchface For Multiple Timezones

  * Display time, updating once per minute, using system font
  * Display Battery power
  * Display notice when Bluetooth is disconnected
  * Have a config/settings option on Phone to configure:
      * Foreground (time/date/etc. text) color
      * Background color
      * Optional vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect (default is do not vibrate), if enabled does not vibrate during quiet time
      * Offline config support, no need for internet access, so timezones can be updated whilst travelling
      * 5 timezone names and offsets (in minutes, to support partial hour offsets, like India). No DST support.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for five timezones, improved Chalk support

data.title: Minute TZ

data.author: Simply
data.description:
This is a paid watchface with a free 24 hour trial. You can purchase it for $0.99 individually or $5.99 for a bundle that includes all watchfaces made by Simply, present and future.

== Features ==
A clean and simple watchface.

- Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano, Čeština, Slovenčina, Català, Türkçe, Português, Polskie, Magyar, Svenska, Norsk
- Anti-aliasing for smooth text
- Custom color configuration
- 12 / 24 hour time
- US / EU date format
- Imperial / Metric units
- Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap or Weather Underground
- Temperature, Condition, & Humidity
- Alternative Timezone
- Steps, Distance, Calories, & Active Time
- Battery
- BT Icon & Vibration
- Disable Health option
- Periodic Vibration
- Quiet Time Support
- Quick View Support
- Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using Simply Sleek!

Simply develops elegant watchfaces with a single focus and creates its design around it. For more information, visit simplywatchfaces.com

Designed & Developed by Elijah Kang

Copyright © 2017 Elijah Kang
data.title: Simply Sleek

data.author: TIMESAPP
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/guess

Guess (timesapp original) is a clear and simple digital watchface with few games, if you like to play. 

*************************

Guess Game: "Games with time, fun with clock".

Do you need a watch to know what time it is, or maybe the decorations ?
Do you always know what time it is, or maybe you know approximately ?

Join a game where the goal is to focus your attention and see if you can accurately determine what time is it.

Why 3 clocks ? Depending on the game you choose, in guessing time some clocks will help, others may give hints and yet another completely mess you in the head. If you want to verify your shot then shake your watch, you will see the real time until the game restart.

Decide which game is best for you.

You can also play free game on any other watch in the world. How ?
Try to guess what is the time before you look at your watch to verify the accuracy of the hit. :)

*************************

Customized information: date, day of week, year, battery, temperature, 2nd clock, steps, distance, active time.

Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather and has options: color customization, hourly vibration, BT alert, languages for week day.

Date language localization: English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski. Guess (timesapp original) is 4.0 ready. 

Idea and Design: Artur Salamon. Programming: Grégoire Sage. Copyrights © Artur Salamon 2017
data.title: Guess (timesapp original)

data.author: Frank Schenke
data.description:
I'm trying to Support OG/Steel :-)

Elegant Watchface with support for: 
-two time-modes (text+digital and digital) with animation (optional)
-supported languages: English & German
-very discrete batterybar 
-optional Seconds
-weather from yahoo/WU/OWM
-support for pmkey.xyz
-Nightmode

If enabled, the battery state is shown as little interruption on the thin line between time and infobox. The pictures above shows 40% battery, for example.

More to come...

This Watchface is based on the great "TextWatch Clima" from dieghernan. 

If You want to support me, feel free to donate via Paypal. See Developers WEBSITE LINK down below

data.description:
A simple watch face that displays the time, rounded to the nearest 1/4 hour with a one word prefix (almost, exactly, basically, etc.) It also displays the day of the week and day of the month at the bottom. 

It is only 12-hour time. I will add support for changing between light and dark themes in the future. 

1st screenshot: 2:03 
2nd screenshot: 3:56

latest_release.release_notes: Changed prefix adjectives to be slightly more precise.

data.title: Simple Word Approximation

data.author: cheeseisdisgusting

changelog.release_notes: Fixed: Caches the location, so we don't use up all the API calls and get blocked by Google. :)

New: Set a default location for your weather.

Fixed: Crashing on Pixel phones when opening settings (hopefully)
Fixed: Bad things happening when an error occurred while fetching weather (like crashes).

Gotta Catch 'Em All!

Time, battery, steps (on compatible hardware), and of course, your favourite Poké Ball. Choose from any of the 27 canonical Poké Balls to display on your wrist, and quickly switch between them with just a flick!

data.description:
Gotta catch 'em all!

With this watchface, you're sure to become the Poké Master in no time - flick your wrist and switch between any of the 27 canonical Poké Balls. View weather, steps, date, and battery percentage in a quick and easy way.

Supports pmkey.xyz Pebble Master Key integration for weather API keys.

tags: Pokémon, Pokemon, Pokéball, Pokeball

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed: Caches the location, so we don't use up all the API calls and get blocked by Google. :)

data.title: Poké Ball

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
Design is called “Timebender” because its ‘hands’ sometimes look bent. They are also very reminiscent of the melting clocks in Salvador Dali’s painting “The Persistence of Memory” and give it a surrealistic feel.

Each pair of ‘hands’ on this watch is actually the top of a digit with a dot added just to help create the illusion that they are watch hands. All you have to do, therefore, to find out the 4-digit time or date is figure out which digit each of the 4 pairs of ‘hands’ belong to. It’s that easy. The ‘hands’ do not move. 

Displays in 12 or 24-hour mode, depending on watch settings.


All colors are configurable (background, circle and numbers).


Image cycles through: 12:36, 07:48, 10:59.



Designed by Lloyd King and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio. The watchface is published with his permission.

Original design can be found at: 
https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/03/02/timebender-lcd-watch-reveals-partial-digits/
data.title: Timebender

data.description:
Elegant Watchface with support for: 
-two time-modes (text+digital and digital) with animation (optional)
-supported languages: English & German

If enabled, the battery state is shown as little interruption on the thin line between time and infobox. The pictures above shows 40% battery, for example.
Under this line grows your step progress with markers every 10%.


More to come...

This Watchface is based on the great "TextWatch Clima" from dieghernan. 

If You want to support me, feel free to donate via Paypal. See Developers WEBSITE LINK down below

data.author: Andor Czafik

changelog.release_notes:
- Reenabled Upcoming holidays for Aplite (classic and steel)
- Now compatible with Gadgetbridge companion app (with some restriction*)

*Details for Gadgetbridge companion app:
Weather is working, but no wind speed, and no forecast. Info script is not working because of internet permission restrictions in gadgetbridge app.

- Memory optimization
- Temporarily disabled 'upcoming holidays' for Aplite platform (low memory)

- Added Week Number to vertical complications.
- Now you can invert the screen when phone is disconnected whether with or without the icon. Can be enabled in 'Vibration and Alert setting'.
- Inverting screen when disconnect is surprisingly useful, thanks to Thanos for the suggestion.
- Debug screen in the 'Load / Save' section of the settings. Useful when you are testing your own info script.

- 2 new font types, LECO1976 and BosaNova
- Thanks for the 200 hearts :)

- Thanks to big memory optimization, now the upcoming holidays also available on aplite platform (Pebble Classic and Steel).
- Upcoming holidays now in new look, better reading for day countdown.
- Option to show seconds on vertical and/or horizontal place. Use show on tap/shake to reduce battery usage!
- More option for today's date (month name, day name mixing).
- Better algorithm to calculate vertical icon sizes, so that fewer icons are converted into a compact view.
- Upcoming Holidays removed from Old Pebbles (Aplite platform) because of memory limitation. Please give me a few days to fix this for Pebble Classic and Steel users.

- Option to add Digital time and/or Date to analog face
- Option to add Day-name to horizontal date format
- New Horizontal status, Countdown for upcoming Holidays, Now for Christian holidays. For other religions please contact me.
- Quick bugfix again, sorry (health data displays zero)
- Fixed Pebble Time Round horizontal health data positioning problem

- Refined some icons and icon-positions
- More variation for vertical column items (good for Time Round)
- Periodic vibration bug-fix: sometimes vibrated more then once in a minute

- Now you can control the status icon, when you want to show on watch
- Option to disable connection check between phone and watch, good for iPhone users who always closing Pebble App
- New weather provider: Yahoo! weathers
- Weather condition text on watch
- More option to show Weather current humidity and wind
- Weather stability improvements
- Icon and text positioning improvements
- Visual feedback on config page for vertical icons

- Now you can colorize separately Analog Watchface minute and hourhand, face and background
- Horizontal Current Weather status now shows Humidity
- New Vertical status, Current Wind speed and Humidity
- Optimized Weather and Info script download period (less battery and server resources usage)
- WeatherUnderground Forecast now calculate from today and tomorrow weather instead of just today
- New design for Pebble Time Round (again, because I got one for test)
- Some bugfix
On next update: More minute based watchface style, Info script improvements

- Support longer text fields (increased char array sizes) 
- Fixed Weather City manual adding bug 
- Fixed vertical bottom icon errors caused by buffer overflow bug 
- Fixed config page layout error on iPhone 5S and SE
- Speed improvements on Pebble 2 (Slow BT)

- New design for Pebble Round
- Fix delta steps for info script calculation bug

- Battery optimization
- Fixed some icons
- Bugfix: config page not loading on iPhone

data.description:
- Highly customizable Digital or Analog watchface.
- 6 font types for digital, and 3 analog face types.
- Colorize everything (each digits, each hours, each numbers)
- Font type based on digit, number, hour
- Weather from OpenWeatherMap, WeatherUnderground or Yahoo! Weather
- Show weather city and/or condition text in your language
- Supports Master Key ( pmkey.xyz ) for Weather API key
- Positive words from external server
- Create your own script to display word or sentence on watch periodically
- Health data steps and heart rate on supported watches
- You can collect your watch actual state with your custom script (battery, steps, HR)
- Upcoming Holidays
- Option to show seconds: always show, or just for [double]tap/shake to reduce battery usage
- Day and month names in your language

This WatchFace is completely free.
If you like my work, please donate me by paypal. You can find the Donate button on WEBSITE LINK

Keywords: analog, digital, customizable, big, bigfont, 9gag, health, heartrate, steps, pebble2, hr, weather, forecast, pmkey.xyz, script, php, vibrate, color, holidays, seconds

latest_release.release_notes:
- Reenabled Upcoming holidays for Aplite (classic and steel)
- Now compatible with Gadgetbridge companion app (with some restriction*)

*Details for Gadgetbridge companion app:
Weather is working, but no wind speed, and no forecast. Info script is not working because of internet permission restrictions in gadgetbridge app.

data.title: NineTime

data.description:
Nice Watchface with some interesting modifications.
- large weekday
- configurable date
- huge time
- steps and 
- heart-rate
- Pebble battery-bar and label (left) and phone battery-bar and label (right)
- or only Pebble battery-bar (whole width) and label (left)

It seems like the current iPhone (7 with current iOS) doesn't show phone-battery values!
Workaround: switch it off in configuration site.

If you have any questions or suggestions for improvements - feel free to contact me.

latest_release.release_notes: Bugfix: Solved problems with hiding phone-battery indication

data.author: TIMESAPP
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/sport

Sport is a clear and simple digital watchface. Design was inspired by rounded corners screen of Pebble Time watch and ttmmstylus watchface (by TTMM). 

Customized information: date, day of week, year, battery, temperature, steps, distance, active time.

Watchface uses Pebble Master Key for Wunderground weather and has options: color customization, hourly vibration, BT alert, languages for week day.

Date language localization: English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski. Sport is 4.0 ready. 

Design: Artur Salamon. Copyrights © 2017 Artur Salamon 2017 all rights reserved

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a bug which caused crashing when returning to watchface from other apps.

data.description: Time Traveler is designed to be clean and readable with extra details on demand. Shake or tap to see the current date, moon phase, alternate time zone, menstrual cycle days count down, battery level, and bluetooth connection status.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a bug which caused crashing when returning to watchface from other apps.

data.title: Time Traveler

data.author: Wim Van Aerschot
data.description:
Read rain predictions on an analog clock. Colors in outer ring are predictions for the next 60 minutes, middle ring are predictions for the next 12 hours.

Explanation of the colors used:
- Red: heavy rain
- Dark blue: rain
- Light blue: light rain
- White: cloudy
- Yellow: sunny

Features:
- Digital clock or use analog clock hands
- Day of week
- Date
- Steps
- Current location
- Temperature
- Battery & connection
- Last updated time

Detailled predictions for the outer ring are only available in US, UK, IE, BE and NL.

Forecast data will be loaded every hour. When there is rain expected, data will be loaded more regularly for detailled predictions. 

This watchface costs 99 cents, with a trial for 24h. Darksky api key is needed to work as expected.

Please give it a ❤️ if you like it :)
data.title: Rainalog

data.author: Normski
data.description: Time, date, heartbeat, peak heartbeat, steps, and battery life.
data.title: Hockey Time

data.author: chops
data.description:
This watchface is sort of a new version of the watchface "PixelSeconds" first published back in May 2014.

It's quite simple - just date and time, with BT status and battery level.

On a PTR, the top number is the date.

On all models, a PM indicator shows in the upper left position of the time row, while AM is indicated lower left.

BT status always shows (under the time), however you can switch between seconds or BT text (minute mode). Via settings you can also invert.
data.title: Pixely

data.description:
Inspired by a design from /u/offu in the Pebble subreddit.

A clean design putting time and weather upfront. Four bottom quadrants can be configured to show all sorts of information:

- Battery level
- Pebble app connection
- Seconds
- Humidity
- Feels like temperature
- High/Low temperature
- Step count
- Distance
- Active time

Background, text, and pin line colors are all configurable.

Weather powered by Weather Underground.

changelog.release_notes: Die Farben für das Infofeld unten lassen sich jetzt separat einstellen. Schriftanpassungen für bessere Lesbarkeit.

data.description:
Neu: Die Farben für das Infofeld unten lassen sich jetzt separat einstellen.

Basiert auf dem großartigen Watchface "TextWatch Clima" von dieghernan.

Jetzt als angepasste deutsche Version mit vielen Optionen:

-Zeitanzeige im Klartext wahlweise minutengenau oder im Fuzzy-Modus (auf fünf Minuten gerundet) der als Digitalanzeige
-Minutenwechsel animiert
-tägliches Schrittziel als Balkenanzeige
-dezente Batterieanzeige im Trennstrich
-Nachtmodus
-Bluetooth-Anzeige bei verlorener Verbindung
-Wetteranzeige mit Symbol und Temperatur (OpenWeatherMap, WUnderground, Yahoo, pmkey.xyz)

Falls dir dieses Watchface gefällt kannst du mich gern via Paypal unterstützen (siehe Link zur Entwicklerwebsite).

latest_release.release_notes: Die Farben für das Infofeld unten lassen sich jetzt separat einstellen. Schriftanpassungen für bessere Lesbarkeit.

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
Time broken into fragments.  

A four digit display with each digit being made up of 7 segments that appear to be rock formations protruding from the walls around them.  

It is cryptic looking, yet easy to read at a glance.

Displays in 12 or 24 hour mode, depending on watch setting.


Configuration options:
- change time and background colors


Images:
1. Image cycles through the display options for:
(a) 07:59 
(b) 10:41 
(c) 12:34 
(d) 06:28
(e) 08:08
2. Image showing the digits


This design was created by Heather Sable Villano and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio. It is published with the designers’ permission. 

The original design can be found here: 
https://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/05/28/crax-watch-breaks-up-time-into-fragments/
data.title: Crax

data.author: ttmm
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have one day trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/ttmm2049

TTMM2049 is a tribute to Blade Runner movie. You need to know Gaff to understand that the future will mix many languages. Here, Japanese characters become Latin digits. You are the Nexus if you can read it. You can setup line of extra informations to: steps, active time, date, temperature and year and see more after shake. Two dots mean BT status. There is hour color customization.

TTMM watchfaces won Silver A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category, 2015 - 2016. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2017

data.author: Lowell Camp

changelog.release_notes: Bugsmashing: Fixed Swopping bug at 12:00 noon and 12:00 midnight.
Bugsmashing: Corrected month display to read identically to hour number

This is a quick design idea I've been mulling over for awhile. Hope you enjoy!
The hour and minutes hands are pretty standard: The long one is the minutes hand, the short inner hand is the hours hand.
The ticks for seconds and hours have some extra functionality: Minute ticks fill in for days of the month, and the hour ticks fill in according to the month. The weekday is also written in the center of the screen!

data.description:
Conveys date, day of the week, and time through a fun, contrasty design inspired by boolean logic!

The hour ticks fill in based on the month, and the minute ticks fill in based on the day of the month.

latest_release.release_notes: Bugsmashing: Fixed Swopping bug at 12:00 noon and 12:00 midnight.

data.title: Boolean
